sense.def:
To designate someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj uradno opisati ali mu dati ime.

seg.quote: The area was designated a national monument.

sense.def:
To designate someone to do a particular job
pomeni nekoga uradno izbrati za določeno delo.

seg.quote: I had been designated to read the lesson.

sense.def:
Besedo
designate
uporabljamo za opis osebe, ki je bila uradno izbrana za neko delo, vendar ga še ni začela opravljati.

seg.quote: Mr Bell had been Attorney General designate.
